customer_reviews.title: WOW!!

So I ordered the Saute Pan and I love it!! It is a good all-purpose pan and a great starter piece. Highly recommend this pan and will be slowly replacing the rest of my cookware with All Clad!

Their warranty only covers manufacturer defects so they will almost never replace your pan but instead offer you a new one at a 'discounted rate' which is still more expensive than Amazon. I am torn between buying a new awesome pan from a company that does not treat their customers very well.
customer_reviews.author: Katie605

customer_reviews.title: Forever cookware won't poison you like non-stick pans
customer_reviews.text: Really all you need. Even cooking, lids fitment spot on. The cleanup isn't like non-stick but it's not far off. A good thing to remember is about every few years they discover that the non-stick leaves bad stuff in your food. You also have to worry about metal utensils and scratching the surface then you end up throwing it away. This stuff won't poison you, you can clean it, use metal spatulas and not worry. If you want shiny scrub it with steel wool and soap. Be sure to scrub in the direction of steel. You'll have shiny in a few laps. This is forever cookware worth passing on to the kids.
customer_reviews.author: C PZ 61

customer_reviews.title: ALL CLAD = LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new skillet since mine died... I have other All Clad pans and just love them but really had a hard time with the price. This happened to go on sale and I snapped it up. This type of pan is something that everyone who likes to cook OR needs to cook should have in their kitchen. You can use it for a variety of things - and once you understand how All Clad works - it is SO EASY to clean. Best of all, none of that non-stick toxic crap that peels off other pans. Well worth the price of admission. I use mine at least 3x per week.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A Corman

customer_reviews.title: The heat distribution is excellent. I have a glass top stove and this pan sits flat.
customer_reviews.text: this is my first experience with All-clad and I love it. I have been using my old revere ware with copper bottoms and I am learey of residue on my glass top. I always put hot water in the pan while the pan is still hot and let it soak. I can cook just about anything with this size pan. Its expensive but worth every penny. The handle takes getting used to and without the helper handle, I would not have bought it. Its a very heavy pan and I am elderly. If you want quality, this is it!
